languages.text: "Уж получше, чем священник из этого толстомордого младенца, который не может держать в голове больше одной литании за раз!"
"A better sort than this so-called preacher, this fat-faced brat whose head can't hold more than one litany at a time!"
languages.original_text: "Уж получше, чем священник из этого толстомордого младенца, который не может держать в голове больше одной литании за раз!"

traits.locale_text: "A better sort than this so-called preacher, this fat-faced brat whose head can't hold more than one litany at a time!"
"A better sort than this so-called preacher, this fat-faced brat whose head can't hold more than one litany at a time!"
"A better sort than this so-called preacher, this fat-faced brat whose head can't hold more than one litany at a time!"
"A better sort than this so-called preacher, this fat-faced brat whose head can't hold more than one litany at a time!"
"A better sort than this so-called preacher, this fat-faced brat whose head can't hold more than one litany at a time!"
"A better sort than this so-called preacher, this fat-faced brat whose head can't hold more than one litany at a time!"

languages.text: “至少我比他这个所谓的‘布道士’要强。他这个小流氓，脑子里最多只能装得下两三句祷词！”
languages.original_text: "A better sort than this so-called preacher, this fat-faced brat whose head can't hold more than one litany at a time!"

traits.locale_text: “至少我比他这个所谓的‘布道士’要强。他这个小流氓，脑子里最多只能装得下两三句祷词！”

languages.text: 「この自称プリーチャーよりはまだマシです。顔の丸いガキめ、一度に一つの聖句すら覚えきれんくせに！」
languages.original_text: "A better sort than this so-called preacher, this fat-faced brat whose head can't hold more than one litany at a time!"

traits.locale_text: 「この自称プリーチャーよりはまだマシです。顔の丸いガキめ、一度に一つの聖句すら覚えきれんくせに！」

languages.text: «¡Uno mejor que este supuesto predicador, este mocoso mofletudo que no es capaz de retener en su memoria más de una letanía!».
languages.original_text: "A better sort than this so-called preacher, this fat-faced brat whose head can't hold more than one litany at a time!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Uno mejor que este supuesto predicador, este mocoso mofletudo que no es capaz de retener en su memoria más de una letanía!».

languages.text: "Kafası aynı anda birden fazla ilahiyi alamayan şu sözde vaizden, şu şişko suratlı veletten daha iyi olanları!"
languages.original_text: "A better sort than this so-called preacher, this fat-faced brat whose head can't hold more than one litany at a time!"

traits.locale_text: "Kafası aynı anda birden fazla ilahiyi alamayan şu sözde vaizden, şu şişko suratlı veletten daha iyi olanları!"

languages.text: « Un noble de plus haut rang que ce prétendu prêcheur, ce bon à rien joufflu dont la tête ne peut contenir plus d'une litanie à la fois ! »
languages.original_text: "A better sort than this so-called preacher, this fat-faced brat whose head can't hold more than one litany at a time!"

traits.locale_text: « Un noble de plus haut rang que ce prétendu prêcheur, ce bon à rien joufflu dont la tête ne peut contenir plus d'une litanie à la fois ! »

languages.text: "Besser als dieser sogenannte Prediger, dieser pausbäckige Jüngling, der sich immer nur eine Litanei merken kann!"
languages.original_text: "A better sort than this so-called preacher, this fat-faced brat whose head can't hold more than one litany at a time!"

traits.locale_text: "Besser als dieser sogenannte Prediger, dieser pausbäckige Jüngling, der sich immer nur eine Litanei merken kann!"
